016package com.exoreaction.xorcery.dns.server;
017
018import com.exoreaction.xorcery.json.JsonElement;
019import com.fasterxml.jackson.databind.node.ObjectNode;
020
021public record KeyConfiguration(ObjectNode json)
022        implements JsonElement {
023    public String getName() {
024        return getString("name").orElseThrow(() -> new IllegalArgumentException("No key name set"));
025    }
026
027    public String getSecret() {
028        return getString("secret").orElseThrow(() -> new IllegalArgumentException("No key secret set"));
029    }
030
031    public String getAlgorithm() {
032        return getString("algorithm").orElse("hmac-md5");
033    }
034}
